TEXT.TITLE: NAT'L PROCESSING <FKYN.O>, CHRYSLER <C> IN PACT
TEXT.BODY: National Processing Co INc said it signed a contract with Chrylser Corp's Chrysler Financial Corp unit to process its loan payment trasactions beginning February 1988. Terms weren't disclosed. National said that more than four mln transactions are expected to be processed for Chrysler each year under the contract. Reuter
